column3: Very comfortable, relaxed, great price, great location, nice breakfast with plenty of variety. Would definitely stay again
Placement of the hotel. Quiet during the night
column4: Insulation around the door of the chamber missing.

column3: Friendly reception. Breakfast was very good. WiFi was good.
column4: Cleanliness in the room was at the time of my visit not OK. Bedlight not working, garbage bin not working. 2nd pillow not fresh at all. First night very calm, second night very noisy outside.

column3: If there ever was a problem. The staff tried it's very best to sort it out. I was there during graspop metal meeting.
Staff were helpful, room was clean and comfortable, breakfast was excellent

column4: On the 6th floor there was constantly a hard "clicking" sound. That becomes from the box near the elevator door. Very irritating..

column3: Location is great, right in town next to the Police station. The staff are excellent and very accommodating.
column4: I was given a very small room to begin with but after I asked for an upgrade was given a suite which was great.
